mapper.sql: JGXTLB, BM, CJZT, CCQDSJ, ZJQDSJ, CJWCSJ, SJZL, CJSJZL, ZHWJM, RKZT, RKWCSJ, RKSJZL, RKWJS, CWXXMS, GXSJ, CJWJS, ID, SBZT
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from ADTMGR.CLSJCLZT
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into ADTMGR.CLSJCLZT (JGXTLB, BM, CJZT, CCQDSJ, ZJQDSJ, CJWCSJ, SJZL, CJSJZL, ZHWJM, RKZT, RKWCSJ, RKSJZL, RKWJS, CWXXMS, GXSJ, CJWJS, ID, SBZT) values (#{jgxtlb,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{bm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cjzt,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{ccqdsj,jdbcType=DATE}, #{zjqdsj,jdbcType=DATE}, #{cjwcsj,jdbcType=DATE}, #{sjzl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cjsjzl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{zhwjm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rkzt,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{rkwcsj,jdbcType=DATE}, #{rksjzl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rkwjs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cwxxms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gxsj,jdbcType=DATE}, #{cjwjs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sbzt,jdbcType=CHAR})

mapper.update:
update ADTMGR.CLSJCLZT
JGXTLB = #{record.jgxtlb,jdbcType=CHAR},
BM = #{record.bm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CJZT = #{record.cjzt,jdbcType=CHAR},
CCQDSJ = #{record.ccqdsj,jdbcType=DATE},
ZJQDSJ = #{record.zjqdsj,jdbcType=DATE},
CJWCSJ = #{record.cjwcsj,jdbcType=DATE},
SJZL = #{record.sjzl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CJSJZL = #{record.cjsjzl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ZHWJM = #{record.zhwjm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RKZT = #{record.rkzt,jdbcType=CHAR},
RKWCSJ = #{record.rkwcsj,jdbcType=DATE},
RKSJZL = #{record.rksjzl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RKWJS = #{record.rkwjs,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CWXXMS = #{record.cwxxms,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GXSJ = #{record.gxsj,jdbcType=DATE},
CJWJS = #{record.cjwjs,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SBZT = #{record.sbzt,jdbcType=CHAR},

update ADTMGR.CLSJCLZT set JGXTLB = #{record.jgxtlb,jdbcType=CHAR}, BM = #{record.bm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CJZT = #{record.cjzt,jdbcType=CHAR}, CCQDSJ = #{record.ccqdsj,jdbcType=DATE}, ZJQDSJ = #{record.zjqdsj,jdbcType=DATE}, CJWCSJ = #{record.cjwcsj,jdbcType=DATE}, SJZL = #{record.sjzl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CJSJZL = #{record.cjsjzl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ZHWJM = #{record.zhwjm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RKZT = #{record.rkzt,jdbcType=CHAR}, RKWCSJ = #{record.rkwcsj,jdbcType=DATE}, RKSJZL = #{record.rksjzl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RKWJS = #{record.rkwjs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CWXXMS = #{record.cwxxms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GXSJ = #{record.gxsj,jdbcType=DATE}, CJWJS = #{record.cjwjs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SBZT = #{record.sbzt,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM nums,u.* FROM CLSJCLZT u) WHERE nums >= #{before} AND nums <= #{after}

select count(*) from CLSJCLZT WHERE 1=1
AND jgxtlb like '%'||#{param1}||'%'
AND bm like '%'||#{param2}||'%'
select sum(CJSJZL) from CLSJCLZT where JGXTLB =#{jgxtlb}
select sum(SJZL) from CLSJCLZT where JGXTLB =#{jgxtlb}
select sum(CJWJS) from CLSJCLZT where JGXTLB =#{jgxtlb}
